textArr:
The Waterfalls of The State of Selangor has a state boundary at the western slopes of the Main Range.
The annual Monsoon rains and tropical storms results in major rivers with many tributaries and waterfalls. 
Rainfall level is fairly consistent on this windward side of the Main Range. 
Hence, the size of waterfalls found in Selangor varies not much in size the whole year round.
   
   


	   Accessability: Easy
	   
	   Picture
	   Name/Location
	   Type
	   Activities
	   Description
	   
	  
	  Cheh Cascade FallUlu Yam Bahru, Batang Kali
	  Cascades
	  PicnicCamping
	  Small cascade fall near a camping resortLast update March 2022
	 
	  
	  Gabai FallsHulu Langat
	  Multiple falls
	  PicnicSwimming
	  This is a popular waterfall, suitable for families, can be crowded during weekendsLast update June 2004
	 
	  
	  Jeram Anjang FallHulu Langat
	  Single fall
	  PicnicCamping
	  Private land accessLast update October 2021
	 
	  
	  Kanching FallsBetween Selayang and Rawang
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  PicnicSwimmingTrekking
	  This recreation park is within easy access from KL. The lower part is easy, suitable for families. The upper falls require trekking. Last update December 2010
	 
	  
	  Komanwel FallBetween KL and Rawang
	  Single fall
	  PicnicTrekking
	  Small waterfall in quiet surroundingsLast update September 2009
	 
	  
	  Perigi TujuhNorth of Rawang, near Serendah
	  Single fall
	  Picnic
	  Not a real waterfall anymore. It has been replaced by seven "wells" and a dam. The effect, however is quite picturesqueLast update December 2003
	 
	  
	  Sendat Falls5 km from  Ulu Yam Baharu
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  PicnicSwimmingTrekkingCamping
	  Still unspoilt, but for how long?
Last update April 2005
	 
	  
	  Serendah Fallnear Serendah
	  CascadesSingle fall
	  PicnicSwimming
	  A beautiful vertical drop.
But ruined by developers....
Last update April 2010
	 
	  
	  Sungei TuaNear Selayang
	  RapidsCascadesSingle fall
	  PicnicSwimmingCamping
	  A couple of nice waterfalls besides the road. Recreation park on the other side of the roadLast update April 2005
	 
	  
	  Tekala Fallsnear the Semenyih Dam
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  PicnicSwimming
	  A popular recreation park in Hulu Langat. Suitable for familiesLast update June 2004
	 
	   Accessability: Moderate
	   
	   Picture
	   Name/Location
	   Type
	   Activities
	   Description
	   
	  
	  Batangsi Fallnear Semenyih
	  RapidsCascades
	  SwimmingTrekking
	  Cascades and rapids in the Sungei Batangsi. Last update April 2010
	 
	  
	  Batu Asah FallsAmpang, Near KL
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  SwimmingTrekking
	  A series of 6 small waterfalls near Zoo NegaraLast update March 2022
	 
	  
	  Batu Berayun FallBatang Kali
	  CascadesSingle fall
	  Trekking
	  A long hike and virtually unknown waterfallLast update September 2021
	 
	  
	  Batu Bertengkek FallsKerling, Hulu Selangor
	  Multiple falls
	  Trekking
	  A rare contrast of a tall & a wide fall within stone throw reach of each other. Features unique rock boulders.Last update April 2021
	 
	  
	  Batu Cherandong Dam FallsKuala Kubu Baru
	  RapidsCascadesMultiple falls
	  PicnicSwimmingTrekkingCamping
	  A pre-independence water catchment dam fall with several smaller natural waterfalls on the same streamLast update April 2022
	 
	  
	  Batu Kapal FallsNorth Batu Caves
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  Trekking
	  A waterfall with an impressively large "ship" shaped boulder. Virtually unknown.Last update March 2021
	 
	  
	  Bukit Apeh FallUlu Langat FR, access from Cheras
	  Multiple falls
	  PicnicSwimmingTrekking
	  Attractive fall, near to the townLast update January 2009
	 
	  
	  Chiling FallsBetween KKB and the Gap
	  Multiple falls
	  SwimmingTrekkingCamping
	  A beautiful fall at the end of an interesting river trekking, during which you have to cross the river several timesLast update August 2015
	 
	  
	  Gapi FallAntara Gapi, Hulu Selangor
	  Single fall
	  Trekking
	  Scenic & tall waterfall. Majestic during wet seasons.Last update December 2021
	 
	  
	  Gapok FallsKg. Paya Lebar, Hulu Langat
	  Multiple falls
	  Trekking
	  Waterfall series with 11 falls of different presentation. popular during weekends.Last update October 2021
	 
	  
	  Jeram PerlusUlu Langat region
	  Single fall
	  PicnicSwimmingTrekking
	  Unspoilt waterfallLast update May 2008
	 
	  
	  Kedondong FallAlongside the road between Batang Kali and Gohtong Jaya
	  CascadesSingle fall
	  PicnicSwimmingTrekking
	  Unknown waterfall near popular recreation parkLast update March 2009
	 
	  
	  Lata Beringin FallsHulu Langat
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  PicnicSwimmingTrekkingCamping
	  Interesting multi-level falls beside a river campsiteLast update April 2022
	 
	  
	  Lata MedangNear Kg Pertak
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  SwimmingTrekkingCamping
	  Remote waterfall. Pristine and unspoiltLast update December 2011
	 
	  
	  Lawing FallsNear Kg Sg Lui, Ulu Langat region
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  SwimmingTrekking
	  Unknown, pristine waterfall in the backyard of KLLast update November 2009
	 
	  
	  Lepok Fallin Ulu Langat, near Kg Pangsun
	  Single fall
	  SwimmingTrekkingCamping
	  Lonely,beautiful fall in Ulu Langat. A two hour trek is needed, worth the effortLast update June 2004
	 
	  
	  Lolo FallsNear Kg Pangsun
	  Multiple falls
	  SwimmingTrekking
	  Two unspoilt waterfalls, Bomoh Ali and Berembun. You must be able to swim to reach Berembun.Last update May 2013
	 
	  
	  Lubuk Kawah FallNear Tanjung Malim
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  SwimmingTrekkingCamping
	  Pristine fall in Ulu Bernam. Guide neededLast update June 2009
	 
	  
	  Masai FallsNear Semenyih
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  Trekking
	  Unconventional cascade falls series in pristine jungleLast update August 2021
	 
	  
	  Pangsun FallKg. Kuala Pangsun, Hulu Langat
	  CascadesSingle fall
	  Trekking
	  Small waterfall upriver of old hydro damLast update November 2019
	 
	  
	  Perdik FallUlu Langat region
	  Multiple falls
	  Trekking
	  Small, unknown waterfall in the Ulu Langat regionLast update January 2010
	 
	  
	  Pisang FallNear Gombak and the Karak Highway
	  Single fall
	  SwimmingTrekkingCamping
	  Nice small waterfall, reachable from the Karak highway (easy) or after a trek from the old Gombak RoadLast update November 2003
	 
	  
	  Setinggi FallBetween Rawang and Serendah
	  Multiple falls
	  SwimmingTrekking
	  Unspoilt waterfallLast update November 2011
	 
	  
	  Sg Ampang FallsUlu Klang, near KL
	  Multiple falls
	  SwimmingTrekking
	  Unspoilt waterfalls in scenic surroundings. The first fall also known as Kemansah Fall
Last update May 2011
	 
	  
	  Sg Luit FallsNear Kg Pertak
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  SwimmingTrekkingCamping
	  Remote, powerful fall. Long access trailLast update February 2012
	 
	  
	  Siong FallSemenyih Dam to Negri Sembilan
	  Single fall
	  Trekking
	  The tall cascade can be seen from the main road. An Orang Asli guide is advisable. Pristine conditionsLast update September 2004
	 
	  
	  Tarun FallsNear Broga
	  Multiple falls
	  Trekking
	  A majestic falls, can be seasonal during low rainfall.Last update December 2021
	 
	  
	  Templer FallsBetween KL and Rawang
	  CascadesSingle fall
	  PicnicTrekkingCamping
	  A nice family site, near to the better known Kanching FallsLast update May 2022
	 
	  
	  Ulu Tamu FallsNear Batang Kali
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  PicnicSwimmingTrekking
	  Unspoilt falls in the backyard of Batang KaliLast update February 2012

The Waterfalls of The State of Selangor has a state boundary at the western slopes of the Main Range.
The annual Monsoon rains and tropical storms results in major rivers with many tributaries and waterfalls. 
Rainfall level is fairly consistent on this windward side of the Main Range. 
Hence, the size of waterfalls found in Selangor varies not much in size the whole year round.
